casebody.data:
John KOVALSKY, Plaintiff in Error, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 17, 1926.) No. 328. Frederick W. Lahr, of St. George, S. I., N. Y., for plaintiff in error. William A. De Groot, U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y. (H. H. Kellogg, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for the United States.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and MACK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
